desc.cn: SGPT（也称为 shell-gpt）是一个强大的命令行界面（CLI）工具，旨在通过终端直接与 OpenAI 模型进行无缝交互。
desc.en: SGPT (aka shell-gpt) is a powerful command-line interface (CLI) tool designed for seamless interaction with OpenAI models directly from your terminal.

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add tbckr https://github.com/tbckr/scoop-bucket.git && \
x scoop install tbckr/sgpt
